Description: The sheet "Promoters vs Detractors (2019)" in the "Consolidated Cookbook" workbook in the "Default" project on the "890Portal" site compares people metrics for detractors and promoters. The data source for this sheet is "Sheet1" in the "Claim Data.xlsx" database, which is connected to Tableau using the "excel-direct" connection. The sheet contains one column named "Detractor/Promoter" and the table name is "Sheet1". Without further information about the data, it is difficult to provide a more detailed summary of the sheet.

The sheet named "Y-o-Y CSAT Comparison" in the workbook "Consolidated Cookbook" provides a comparison of CSAT (Customer Satisfaction) metrics for an organization and industry over multiple years. The data is sourced from the Sheet1 in the NPS Metrics.xlsx database using the excel-direct connection. The sheet has three columns - CSAT (Org), CSAT (Industry), and Year - with a total of three tables named Sheet1. The dashboard is created to compare people metrics based on this data.

The sheet "Cycle Times on Insurance Claim" displays data related to the cycle time and ID of insurance claims. The data is sourced from a datasource named "Sheet1" which is connected to a database named "Claim Data.xlsx" using a direct excel connection. The sheet contains two columns named "CYCLE TIME" and "ID" and the table name is "Sheet1". The dashboard "Comparison of People Metrics" is created using this sheet as a data source.

The sheet "Rural/Urban Distribution (2019)" in the "Consolidated Cookbook" workbook on the "Default" project in the "890Portal" site is based on data from the "Sheet1" datasource, which is connected to the "Claim Data.xlsx" database using the "excel-direct" connection. The sheet has one column named "URBANICITY" and shows a comparison of rural and urban distribution for a certain set of people metrics. Without further information, it is difficult to provide a more detailed summary of the sheet's data.

The sheet named "Y-o-Y NPS Comparison" in the Tableau dashboard "Comparison of People Metrics" displays a comparison of the Net Promoter Score (NPS) for an organization and the industry it operates in over the years. The data is sourced from a datasource named "Sheet1 (NPS Metrics)" which is an Excel file named "NPS Metrics.xlsx". The sheet has 3 columns - Year, NPS (Org), and NPS (Industry) - and the table name for all the columns is "Sheet1". The dashboard is part of the "Consolidated Cookbook" workbook in the "Default" project of the "890Portal" site.
